channel.title: Kicksecure 17 End of Security Support and Deprecation Notice - All users should move to Kicksecure 18!
channel.description:
As per Kicksecure [Support Schedule](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/About#Support_Schedule), this post serves as the Kicksecure version 17 deprecation notice.
Kicksecure 18 stable has been released for all platforms.
* https://forums.kicksecure.com/t/kicksecure-18-released-major-release-upgrade/1375 * https://forums.kicksecure.com/t/kicksecure-18-for-qubes-released-major-release-upgrade/1377
**Kicksecure 17 will be deprecated on `06 February 2026`.**
All users should upgrade!
The more time that passes after the deprecation date, the harder or even impossible it might become to perform an in-place [release upgrade](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Release_Upgrade).
----
Platform specific notice:
* [Non-Qubes-Kicksecure](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Non-Qubes-Kicksecure): No special notice. * [Qubes-Kicksecure](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Qubes): Quote [Support Schedule](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/About#Support_Schedule)
> * Version [`17`: The goal is to provide support for as long as Qubes `R4.2` receives security support from Qubes](https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/10219) and Debian. [footnote in wiki]

item.title: Kicksecure 17 End of Security Support and Deprecation Notice - All users should move to Kicksecure 18!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
As per Kicksecure Support Schedule, this post serves as the Kicksecure version 17 deprecation notice.

Kicksecure 18 stable has been released for all platforms.

  • Kicksecure 18 Released! Major Release Upgrade!
  • Kicksecure 18 for Qubes Released! Major Release Upgrade!

Kicksecure 17 will be deprecated on 06 February 2026.

All users should upgrade!

The more time that passes after the deprecation date, the harder or even impossible it might become to perform an in-place release upgrade.

Platform specific notice:

  • Non-Qubes-Kicksecure: No special notice.
  • Qubes-Kicksecure: Quote Support Schedule
  • Version 17: The goal is to provide support for as long as Qubes R4.2 receives security support from Qubes and Debian. [footnote in wiki]

Read full topic
item.source: Kicksecure 17 End of Security Support and Deprecation Notice - All users should move to Kicksecure 18!
